LayoutShiftAttribution.summary: NOTE Experimental The LayoutShiftAttribution interface provides debugging information about elements which have shifted.

remarks.para: Instances of LayoutShiftAttribution are returned in an array by calling .

-Debug layout shifts
-Debug Web Vitals in the field

LayoutShiftAttributionPreviousRect.summary: NOTE Experimental The previousRect read-only property of the interface returns a object representing the position of the element before the shift.

LayoutShiftAttributionNode.summary: NOTE Experimental The node read-only property of the interface returns a representing the object that has shifted.

LayoutShiftAttributionCurrentRect.summary: NOTE Experimental The currentRect read-only property of the interface returns a object representing the position of the element after the shift.

LayoutShiftAttributionToJSON.summary: NOTE Experimental The toJSON() method of the interface is a serializer that returns a JSON representation of the LayoutShiftAttribution object.
LayoutShiftAttributionToJSON.returns: A JSON object that is the serialization of the object.
